attributes.action: There is no place for Cathy Newman as a journalist as she was caught spreading false information, Britons will not accept this!
attributes.additional_details: This petition is behalf of all the people who want the truth when given news on television or anywhere else, we deserve to know the truth, there is no room for journalists who lie, we rely on the news, this is not fair, we will stand up for a change. We want Cathy Newman fired!!!
